sentences.en: According to superstitious belief , this is because of retribution for bad deeds.
sentences.cn: 侦察员报告说, 她已经离开北京了.

sentences.en: All its passion of comradeship among Allies , of retribution upon the common fee dominated our minds.
sentences.cn: 而同盟国之间的战友情谊以及对于共同敌人的复仇情绪,支配了我们的全部思想.

sentences.en: Do evil actions bring retribution after death?
sentences.cn: 恶行在人死后会有报应 吗 ?

sentences.en: Drowning person greedy tour information, immediate retribution, the surface of Dayton festered.
sentences.cn: 溺水人贪赏告发, 立即得到报应, 面上顿生疮.

sentences.en: Happiness and courage, retribution or justice are secondary ends for them.
sentences.cn: 幸福和勇气, 报应或正义都是次要他们的目的.

sentences.en: He didn't want any further involvement for fear of retribution.
sentences.cn: 他担心受到惩罚，不想再牵涉其中。

sentences.en: His right hand suddenly ordered divine retribution to stand by.
sentences.cn: 他的右手突然命令上天的惩罚做好准备.

sentences.en: If that wasn't retribution , what was?
sentences.cn: 谁说这不是报应 呢 !

sentences.en: Is this not the retribution we waited years for.
sentences.cn: 这不正是我们等了这么多年的报偿么?

sentences.en: Restitution is more important than retribution.
Retribution paladins have been deleted, replaced with a same level loladin.
sentences.cn: 惩戒骑士被删除了, 取代他们的是搞笑骑士.

sentences.en: The best weapon that the Chinese use are fear and retribution.
sentences.cn: 中国方最好的武器就是恐惧和复仇.

sentences.en: This gave them the freedom to make trouble all over the shop without fear of retribution.
sentences.cn: 这使他们可以肆意到处惹是生非，而不用担心受到惩罚。

sentences.en: Vengeance ( Retribution ) now stacks up to 2 times, reduced from 3.
sentences.cn: 复仇 ( 惩戒系 ) 叠加次数减少到2次.

trans.tran_cn: 应得的惩罚，报应，报复，报答，报偿
trans.tran_en: Retribution is punishment for a crime, especially punishment that is carried out by someone other than the official authorities
